Gradient Zero, an Eqlipse Company is looking to hire exceptional and motivated talent who can both operate at scale and grow with the platform. Gradient Zero thrives at standing on the mission’s edge supporting missions that matter. We remain singularly focused on implementing our client’s vision and accelerating the execution of their goals providing cross cutting solutions in intelligence operations, identity management and data management. We have an amazing team and looking for problem solvers, innovators, technologists, and operators looking to remain in the forefront of driving meaningful change and seeking to make an enduring impact on the national security mission. Make your mark standing at the mission's edge.Job Description:We are seeking a Principal Machine Learning Researcher to work collaboratively with our highly talented team to further our research in generative adversarial networks (GANs) and related content generation methods. The ideal candidate has experience developing new models, methods, and algorithms based on published research and related technology trends. The position requires both developing detailed solution architecture and hands on software development of the algorithms. The position will be responsible for the coordination, supervision, and direct manipulation of trainings for models as well as the mentoring of other team members in effective TensorFlow and related library optimizations to reduce training time and increase output quality. Candidates must have strong programming skills in Python, Fluency with TensorFlow 2.x, and previous experience working with a team of engineers to productize offerings.Requirements:A Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Machine Learning, or related fields from a nationally accredited college/university plus at least 6 years of experience in a similar Machine Learning Engineering or Research role OR at least 10 years of experience in a similar Machine Learning Engineering or Research role.U.S. citizenship is required.Experience with distributed/multi-gpu training of deep neural networks.Experience with generative modeling techniques (ex: GANs).Proficiency in Image Processing, Image Analysis, and/or Computer Vision.Fluency with Python.Familiarity with distributed computing libraries such as Horovod, MPI, Dask, or Ray.Experience with the C programming language, CUDA, or openGL.Familiarity with other deep learning frameworks such as Keras, ONNX, or PyTorch.Fluency with TensorFlow 2.x.Strong communication ability to coordinate across engineering and customer-facing team.Experience mentoring junior staff on Machine Learning concepts and coding techniques.Desired:10+ years Python experience.Post graduate degree in Machine Learning or Artificial Intelligence, preferably in Computer Vision or a related subject area.Ability to work independently, in a SCRUM-like environment with strong desire to push your ideas into production, overcoming obstacles, in order to deliver impact.Preference for a candidate who is located within the DMV (DC, Maryland, Virginia) area.Benefits:Gradient Zero is as obsessed about our employees as our customers. We want to provide great benefits and perks so you can focus on making an impact. We recognize that industry is moving away from better benefits so we have decided to do our part to start reversing the trend. Join us in our quest to disrupt, transform and innovate.Competitive PayPaid Time Off (PTO) / Holiday (25-30 days)100% Company paid medical, dental, vision, life insurance and disability plans at all levels of coverageHealth Reimbursement AccountFlexible Spending Account401(k) Match with no vesting schedule Powered by JazzHR6aSnedEtiE
